且.definition: and; moreover; yet; for the time being; to be about to; both (... and...)

且休.definition: rest for now; stop (usually imperative form)

且慢.definition: to wait a moment; do not go too soon

且末.definition: Cherchen nahiyisi or Qiemo county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

且末縣.definition: Cherchen nahiyisi or Qiemo county in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture, Xinjiang 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州[Ba1 yin1 guo1 leng2 Meng3 gu3 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang

且末遺址.definition: ruins of Cherchen, Qarqan or Chiemo, archaeological site in Bayingolin Mongol Autonomous Prefecture 巴音郭楞蒙古自治州, Xinjiang

且聽下回分解.pinyin: qiě tīng xià huí fēn jiě
且聽下回分解.definition: to listen to the next chapter for an explanation
